source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenic night view of the River Seine in Paris, with the iconic Notre Dame Cathedral visible in the distance. The city lights from the buildings and street lamps cast a beautiful, shimmering reflection on the water. The video appears to be a time-lapse, as a tour boat decorated with blue lights creates a motion blur as it travels down the river.
